name: Unicorns against the leak
description:
The factories in the valley are leaking out evil water destroying the trees and drowning the villagers! Help stop the leaks with the rainbow shield of your unicorn force and save the day!

Use WASD to move the camera, click on the unicorn you want to move and right click on the map to where the unicorn should turbo travel at unicorn light speed to and use its shield!

Game created during Nordic Game Jam by Damien Morello and Sara Cecilia.
